resources.string: We-Donate brings Digitization in Donation.\n Giving is not just about making a donation,\n Its about \"MAKING A DIFFERENCE\"
We-Donate lets you turn your spare time \n into charitable donations for your favourite \n non-profit or charity organizations.
We-Donate delievers your donation to the \n right hands and provides home pickup services.\n \"Lets Spread Happiness\"
Enter your email address linked \n to your account
